name: Göran Kauermann
content: Home - Chair of Applied Statistics in Social Sciences Economics and Business - LMU MÃ¼nchen Chair of Applied Statistics in Social Sciences, Economics and Business The team works on applied statistics in the field of Economics, Business Administration, Social and Political Sciences. Our research interests lie in the field of statistical network data analyses, data driven conflict and peace research, statistical modelling and quantification of uncertainty in machine learning.
